source.name: EPA Water Services - Total Waters Service
source.description: The WATERS Web and Database services provide open interfaces to complex analyses. These services make extensive use of the NHD and referenced program data in the RAD, and also integrate other WATERS program data. Designed as loosely coupled modular units, the services are developed in a common architecture. Returns precalculated summary information about the surface water and the EPA water quality and other information by state, Hydrologic Unit Code (HUC) 8 subbasins and (National Hydrography Dataset) NHD Feature Codes.
